string-array.name: articelTitle
string-array.item: My 50 Best Travel Tips After 10 Years Traveling The World
25 Things You Should Do Before Boarding a Plane, According to a Frequent Flier

string-array.name: articelContain
string-array.item: My traveling started when I quit my job and took a one-way flight from Miami to Guatemala, leaping nervously into the unknown and leaving much of my old life behind while embarking on an epic adventure around the world.
